name: Homepage keyword search with optional refinements (OsClass)
description: Performs a keyword search with user-provided keywords (atleast 4 characters) and optionally applies common refinements (pictures only, price range, category, sort, view mode, pagination) via URL parameters. Performs fresh search, can be called from any page. Precondition: None (Can be called from any page). Successful outcome: Navigation to page with search results.

steps.description: Perform search with provided parameters by constructing URL.

input_schema.name: sCategory
input_schema.format: Needs category ID between 2-25 (NOT category name). Use this mapping from name to ID - {Antiques: 2, Appliances: 3, Arts + crafts: 4, Auto parts: 5, Beauty + health: 6, Bikes: 7, Boats: 8, Books: 9, Cars + trucks: 10, Cell phones: 11, Collectibles: 12, Computer parts: 13, Computers: 14, Electronics: 15, Farm + garden: 16, Furniture: 17, Household: 18, Jewelry: 19, Motorcycles: 20, Music instruments: 21, Photo + video: 22, Rvs + campers: 23, Video gaming: 24}
